Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Suicin 65 (natural AMPs; LANTIBIOTIC, type 2, class 1 bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; UCSS1b; XXT3)

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: It can only be expressed when the bacterium was grown on solid culture medium. Chromatigraphic purification, including HPLC.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide most resembles (84.6% similarity)Streptococcin A-FF22.Chemical modification: Three thioether bonds: residues 8-13; 10-24, and 17-25. In addition, residue 23 is dehydrated.Activity: inhibition zone: Active against nearly all the S. suis strains tested, including antibiotic resistance strains.
Literature Information.Author: Vaillancourt K, LeBel G, Frenette M, Fittipaldi N, Gottschalk M, Grenier D. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Purification and Characterization of Suicin 65, a Novel Class I Type B Lantibiotic Produced by Streptococcus suis
